revised_title: Investigating Tidal Irregularities at Chatham, Sheerness, Woolwich, and Deptford in February 1756
tldr: This article reports on the irregularities of tides observed at Chatham, Sheerness, Woolwich, and Deptford in February 1756. The authors attribute these irregularities to strong winds and changes in wind direction during the week, which affected the height and flow of the tides.
